DOC.brief_summary: This study is being done to assess the clinical course and treatment options for Crohn's Disease (CD) and ulcerative colitis (UC) in the populations of Eastern Europe, Middle East, and North Africa.
DOC.brief_title: Study of Participants With Crohn's Disease and Ulcerative Colitis in Eastern Europe, Middle East, and North Africa (P08166)
DOC.criteria: Confirmed diagnosis of Crohn's disease or ulcerative colitis.
